about_the_game:
Along with the game, please support our talented composer by downloading Servants of Harvest Wish's original soundtrack featuring 22 wonderfully composed Touhou-style themes. This game's music mainly focuses on showing off the beauty of Japanese instruments, but some tracks experiment with a modern feel as well -- needless to say, there's something for everyone. If you're a follower of Inari, listening to this soundtrack while farming is highly recommended.

Main Soundtrack Composer: DJ Abner
Mikuzume's Mind Game (Mastermind Version) Composer: Naudiz

fullgame.name: 東方催狐譚 ～ Servants of Harvest Wish

legal_notice:
This STG is a derivative work of the Touhou Project, and is made in accordance
with the official guidelines for Touhou fanworks.
Please do not contact the official series creator with any questions about this game.
name: 東方催狐譚 ～ Servants of Harvest Wish Soundtrack
short_description: Surround yourself with the magic of the Japanese autumn season with these marvellous 22 Touhou-styled compositions
